website_summaries.verdict: Sleek and tight and will make you feel like a professional athlete.
pros: A highly regarded brand in the sports world that provides a product engineered to help athletes perform
Protects your skin and provides decent compression that works best for shorter, high endurance activities
Can fit small on athletic legs, however some customers appreciate this
cons: We wish the tight would fit below the ankle

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a Christmas present for my husband who plays flag football in all kinds of weather. He's worn them in the cold and rain so far, so I can't comment how they would feel in warmer weather. Size-wise, he's a 30-32, so I ordered a Medium. These fit perfectly, though they are slightly long but still very wearable, just a little scrunched at ankle area (he's 5'7"). He really likes them, including the fit, and even though it may be psychological, he said they make him feel faster. I would recommend purchasing, especially since they're so affordable.
customer_reviews.author: MarianT

customer_reviews.title: Received this product on time and it fits really well ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this product on time and it fits really well. I ordered a small and I am about 5'7'' at 145 lbs. The small is about 29-32 inches.
customer_reviews.author: poptark

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect, he wears them under his shorts and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who is running track. It is still very cold in our area and running around town in shorts is just not ok. These are perfect, he wears them under his shorts and they keep his legs from exposure to the cold. He loves them. For reference to sizing: he has a 30" waist, 32" inseam, is about 5'8" and weighs about 120lbs. We bought a small and they fit him, but I wish I would have purchased the medium instead. I am very happy with my purchase. I wish they weren't so expensive, but he likes the Nike brand. I definitely would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: MMR

customer_reviews.title: Fits me just fine
customer_reviews.text: I have a 31 inch waist and 6' tall. These fit really well on me. They don't cover ankle 100% but I like them that way actually. Just make sure you wash these in cold water and air dry. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: T1me2Adv3nture

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son for football practice and weights. He said he loves them and help him from getting scalded on his legs from sweating. He told me nike is made small, so instead of his usual large pants i got him a xl and they fit perfect. Wish the nike logo was sewn on instead of like a iron logo, so that will prob wear off quickly as much as he uses them, but so far so good. I am glad I went up a size so keep that in mind when ordering . He is 6ft tall, 215 pounds if that helps for reference.
customer_reviews.author: the mrs b

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: They are quite tight and provide decent compression and are comfortable to wear. I think I could use more compression but these aren't advertised as strong compression. My waist is somewhere between 35"-36" and large fits well. What I don't like is the stitching, especially in the front. More often than not I put shorts over them, but that makes it hotter and makes the wicking less useful. With the mesh and the stitching they do look a little like underwear which is unfortunate, but there are no problems wearing these without something over them.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable running tights
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised at how light they are when I opened the package, particularly for the price. However, they are warmer than you might think in cold weather, conform to the body very well and are very comfortable to wear. They wick sweat well and don't have any uncomfortable seams or places that bind. I am older, weigh in at 185 and run typically 5+ mile circuits three or four times a week. I use them when the weather gets down into the lower 50's and they are just about right from there until the weather gets down into the low 40's. I am thinking I may need more of these.
customer_reviews.author: jwc456

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been needing these for a quite some time so I finally did my Amazon research and came across this pair of Nike tights. I have somewhat of a weird build so finding the right size was sort of difficult for me. My waist size is typically 33 or 34. I ended up going with the medium. They fit nicely. I play basketball in them and they actually make me feel great when I play. My legs don't get stiff and I stay loose throughout the games. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Collura

customer_reviews.title: Great for running and workouts
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tights I've bought for working out. They're thick enough and provide enough support that I can wear them on their own without putting on a show for my fellow gym-goers. The sizing seems accurate. I'm 6'2", 215 with a 33" waist and the large fits exactly as expected. They're a bit warm for summers here in FL but so long as I keep moving there's enough air flow in them that I don't get overheated (#motivation).
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: I had to try these for my early morning walks and they work great. Keep me warm and help with compression on the legs for a longer more comfortable walk. I say get them. But one thing. I ordered a larger size and I should have went with my size. Just get your size and they will fit great.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Great tights!
customer_reviews.text: These are cool so far. The material is a little thin or light. I wish the compression was more. Fo now I have no complaints. I would recommend them. I hope they last as long or longer than my other thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Franklin

customer_reviews.title: the most durable tights ever. We won't ever buy ...
customer_reviews.text: the most durable tights ever. We won't ever buy anything but Nike pro tights for our son. He is so hard on his knees (he's a keeper) ..and he blows right thru pants BUT man, not the tights. He owns 3 pair (for variety) and not one run snag or hole.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley B

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in product images
customer_reviews.text: The tights I was sent were not as shown in photo as the Nike logo is on thigh rather then being near my calves as I wanted. Quality is great and feels authentic overall but you can’t showcase an item just to send one I could’ve easily bought in store.. would give 5 stars if I was sent the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Small rips developed quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really like these tights and the way they feel when I'm playing basketball. They give me an empowering feeling and also makes me more comfortable when trying to dive for the ball, as I won't end up scraping my knees. However, after a few wears, I started noticing small tears near the stitching above the knee. Small holes started developing after just 2 wears. I didn't do anything too crazy such that they should be damaged like that. It seemed to have just ripped from normal use. If it weren't for these small rips, I'd have given 5 stars though.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: I don't workout without them anymore
customer_reviews.text: I wear these under a pair of shorts when I lift. They keep my legs warm, offer a bit of support, and they wick away sweat. I went a size larger which makes for a very comfortable fit. Solid product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: TheWebCoder

customer_reviews.title: Decent pair of tights
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1, 160lbs and have a 28" waist. I purchased a medium and although it does fit nicely around my waist and legs (not too tight), the length needs to be a couple of inches longer. It stops about 1.5 inches above my ankle. This is the main problem when buying tights.
customer_reviews.author: A. Max

customer_reviews.title: . Ripped after three uses.and tights ripped after three uses
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get these leggings. However i am upset that i did not heed the warning of others. I was hoping the swooh sign was wear it was advertised i.e. on the chin/close to angle. However they are close tonthe thigh. I am really disappointed in this. Plus it ripped after three uses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6'1 205 lbs, usually wear medium shorts or 33 ...
customer_reviews.text: 6'1 205 lbs, usually wear medium shorts or 33 jeans, these are extremely small on the legs if you workout at all. Sizing chart says M, I bought L, shoulda got XL.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for chilly days
customer_reviews.text: They are thin and perfect for chilly days. I was worried about the quality compared to my other pair that are thicker. I air dry them to help them last longer.
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: Nike Tights
customer_reviews.text: I wear a medium/31 waist in just about everything. This are pretty true to size, but a little tight in the crotch. Not a deal breaker if you adjust things.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered by my measurements and the item was way too small, paid $39.99 plus 3.99 shipping opened package to find $35 was on price tag, returned and only received $27 refund, BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonman

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The Nike logo is on the thighs and not between the shin/calves as pictured. Cosmetically, it's pointless having the logo on the things as I wear running shorts over it and it covers it completely, Nike's loss on building brand equity (not that they need it) but their marketing will suffer as a result to competitors who visibility shows their logo.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Inseam only 24 inches
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised as a 32 inch inseam and what I received only 24 inch inseam. These would fall just below the knee. I was looking for a length down to the ankle. Returning
customer_reviews.author: IFALLSMICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal. Mesh on inside
customer_reviews.text: Good fake?. The pair I bought in stores is all compression material. The inside of the legs on these is mesh, not all the polyester material like you find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Seems like knock off
customer_reviews.text: Product fits different the only things I couldn’t do was the letters fading off that quick
customer_reviews.author: Wayne X

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice tights that do their job well. They are very high quality and comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The Nike symbol is on the upper thigh and not the lower part of the leg as pictured, but other than that it’s fine
customer_reviews.author: Cherish O.

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS 👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: Unacceptable! Paid $40 for these pants for my son to wear under basketball shorts. Fell in the pants ONE TIME during practice and the ripped like women’s stockings! He literally only wore them for 5 mins! I requested a refund and was only given $14 refund! ZERO STARS! NOT REAL NIKE !
customer_reviews.author: stephannie

customer_reviews.title: Received a different one.
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good. I received one with the logo on the upper part of the leg instead on the lower one so not sending the one on the photo from the description? Im Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Locke

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not obvious.
customer_reviews.text: 6’-205lbs. Originally order large. Way to small. Went with xxl and fits good. Perhaps an xl would have been OK but xxl is not to big for me. Otherwise seems to be a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described
customer_reviews.text: Fits great but not exactly as pictured. The swoosh is on the thing on mine where you can not see it when wearing shorts. The picture shows it on the calf which is what I was expecting and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Great for 'seasoned' athletes
customer_reviews.text: I am a 50+ competitive athlete and sleep in compresion wear following competition. Recovery is overnight and I am ready to go next day. Nike compresion is my 'go to' choice!
customer_reviews.author: Mature

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong compression pants
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the one that has the Nike check by the lower leg and got the one by the thigh. Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carson

customer_reviews.title: Another great Nike product!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Keeps you warm on chilly days. I've been wearing two of these (under my shorts) when walking my dog in sub-25 degree weather and it works very well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Another winner by Nike!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Great materials. Excellent design. Got nothing but praise for this one
customer_reviews.author: Sean Sadoun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased lots of leggings for my husband who works outdoors these are by far his favorite pair and they fit perfectly ordered a large & hes 6’5
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Sliker-Allton

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! feels awesome! not too much compression, but very comfortable. took a while to pull it on, but once it's on, it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Either fake or from damaged throw away items
customer_reviews.text: The nike check on the leg was falling off before I even used them, and didn't make it through one 40 minute basketball game. Either these are not real nike products or they are from some damaged goods throw aways. Feel like I got ripped off a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old (size mens small) loves them and they fit him well. He's 5'6" and skinny.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm21

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is being used for
customer_reviews.text: Actually using for biking on moderately cool days. It helps better than bare skin
customer_reviews.author: JJSoul

customer_reviews.title: Logo fell off after 10 washes
customer_reviews.text: the logo fell off very quickly after buying the tights.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and is of excellent quality that you expect from Nike! Plus you get it at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for working out or being on your feet all day at the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Itchy
customer_reviews.text: These don’t keep you very warm. My husband says they’re very itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Swan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Wear. I go running with it , swimming and all other activities. I would higly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: JO-E-Z

customer_reviews.title: Thick material
customer_reviews.text: It’s a much thicker material then I thought it would be. Probably better for cold weather, not for humidity like where I’m living
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: These are great compression pants
customer_reviews.text: These are great compression pants. I like how they sit low on my waist. Fit well, probably should get a second set as I wear them quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My high school son needed these for track and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Pants aren’t durable at all. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Tore during first workout. And I box. Lol. Hitting heavy bag. Don’t feel like going through the stress of sending them back so I just took the lost. Just know the quality isn’t perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: great tights. Unlike most that bunch at the knees ...
customer_reviews.text: great tights. Unlike most that bunch at the knees these stay compressed. Light and airy a little thin but not too bad to where it is see through. I will buy other colors
customer_reviews.author: Ernest J. Gabion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and provide for maximum airflow. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: sean aust

customer_reviews.title: Miss marked for size. Tiny XL!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as he loves his first pair and wears them so much they are warm out. But these are only a 27 inch waist and marked a men's XL?? No one in our house hold can wear them. Tiny!
customer_reviews.author: Deb's deal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had my other ones two years. The "mesh" in the crotch eventually wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All-star!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my high schooler. He plays 3 sports and I bought 2 more him! Fit great, no pulling or no uneasy twisting of fabric.
customer_reviews.author: JILL

customer_reviews.title: The best running tights
customer_reviews.text: The best running tights! Fits is super! It provides excellent support and protection from the wind and cold ran outside today 32F and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Emma/Suresh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal Nike customer for decades- this is probably the worst quality product they have produced. The product should be listed as women's nylons and also lacks elasticity, so ends up running small. Should be priced at around $10.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just a bit too short for my height (6'1/186cm), fits everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: MightyLee88

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1 size small
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’11 170lbs and thought a large would work, I was mistaken. Size up I recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected for me. I'm about 5"11 220 and the large fits well. The length is just right...to my ankles. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian808

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If you are a 2X, order these 4X. I’m not sure what scale they go by, Liliputian perhaps. Tights ripped at waist after first wash. Totally not worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy son--good fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his tights. Enjoyed wearing them for track this spring.

customer_reviews.title: What-a-tight!
customer_reviews.text: These tights are awesome. i am exercising with them, and they are so comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: loved it it fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: loved it it fits perfect, I would post a picture but thats to personal. but loved the product thank you very much came in a day early as well!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. I'm going to have to buy more for him. Fit as expected. Fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, But
customer_reviews.text: I love the length XXX, my only complaint is that the waist band needs to be wider to help prevent it from folding over while running...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tights, good price, fits as expected. I wear nike medium and I got a medium, fits perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Item not as pictured. I wanted the Nike logo lower on the calf like the item shows. When I received them the logo was above the knee. Also you can see the crotch inseam is different too.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for any sports activity but kinda pricy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

I put on the pants and then instantly felt them all over. Extremely weird and disappointed by Nike for selling something like this.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: Love it, fits true to size. I bought a Medium and my waist ranges from 30-32. Only thing stopping me from giving it 5 stars is that the Nike sign wears off more and more after each wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NIKE Men's Pro Tights
feature_bullets: Nike Pro fabric provides sweat-wicking support.
Flat, elastic waistband provides a smooth, secure fit.
Heathered waistband and lower leg panels offer an athletic look.
Slim fit closely follows your body’s shape to help you feel focused and let you move freely.
